data.title: Administration and Campus Services
data.text:
Shuttle Services

The summer shuttle service will pause on August 9 and resume on August 22, 2024.

From Thursday, August 22nd to Tuesday, August 27th, the Combo Shuttle (Campus and Waltham Shuttle) will be in service between 8 AM and 6 PM. (excluding Saturday 8/24)

On Saturday, August 24th, there will be a shuttle service with a limited number of stops from 10 AM to 6 PM.

Full shuttle service begins on August 28, 2024.

Download the TripShot App and tutorial here .

Brandeis provides safe and efficient transportation for community members on campus and to nearby cities.

Summer Schedule: June 3 - August 9

TripShot App

The TripShot app helps simplify your campus commute by providing riders with access to the bus schedule, alerts and bus tracking.

Download the New Transportation App: TripShot App

Setup Directions for TripShot App

Transportation Requests

Public Safety works with our outside vendor DPV to schedule transportation for academic and social purposes. Please complete the Transportation Requests Form, and a DPV reservation team member will contact you. Transportation quotes will be emailed within two business days. Quotes are valid for five business days and must be confirmed. Questions can be emailed to transportation@brandeis.edu.

Service Animal Policy
